physicalDescription.extent: Dimensions:206 x 280 mmCondition:The print is in good condition, though the mounting paper is heavily foxed and crumbling. A large dark area in the sky at upper left probably originated in the printing process.Foliation:‘9’Process:Silver gelatin

mods.abstract: Genre/Subject Matter:View from on board ship, looking towards the Falk-al-asad Inlet, on the coastline of the Persian Gulf, between Musandam Island and the mainland. In the left background a steamer trails a plume of smoke. Behind it high rocky hills line the shore.Inscriptions:Ink, below image: 'Falk-al-asad Inlet, Persian Gulf.'
